p: For immunohistochemistry analysis, the IHC reaction was assessed using light microscopy following scoring criteria: 0, no or faint staining intensity; 1+, faint cytoplasmic staining; 2+, moderate and incomplete membranous staining; and 3+, strong membranous staining. The intensity of immunohistochemistry or immunofluorescence staining was generated using Image J software from three representative images.
